channel.title: Bf3 Players review this
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Pqp5-rTMnU
Was my first recorded clip of that kind. I've hit shots like that before but what made it so special was the fact I really wasn't expecting it.
Also it looks better when you view it on youtube
Just curious if anyone thinks it's special or meh

item.title: Bf3 Players review this
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

thats pro

Read full topic

item.title: Bf3 Players review this
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:17, topic:517865”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=636129.msg4294098#msg4294098 date=1367890837]
I suck at BF3 lol. I usually just play conquest when I do play it.
[/quote]
I’ve just always been a CoD player (don’t hurt me), so the sensitivity, or overall control of the camera feels rigid, rather than smooth like CoD. I do enjoy that the game is quite realistic in many different aspects.[/quote]
Call of Duty is about the only FPS game I play besides Halo on rare occasions.

Read full topic

item.title: Bf3 Players review this
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

I suck at BF3 lol. I usually just play conquest when I do play it.

I’ve just always been a CoD player (don’t hurt me), so the sensitivity, or overall control of the camera feels rigid, rather than smooth like CoD. I do enjoy that the game is quite realistic in many different aspects.

Read full topic

item.title: Bf3 Players review this
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

marcbob:

If you guys are interested in playing bf3 on xbox 360 let me know. Just tell me your gamertag, not trying to brag but I get a lot of friend requests now a days. I don’t mind playing by myself because I honestly get better clips by myself, but I recorded a few games with some people where we were playing strategically and calling out stuff which will make for good live comm gameplays.

I’d be interested in playing with you.
GT: KRLM (Yes, that is an ‘L’)

Read full topic

item.title: Bf3 Players review this
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

If you guys are interested in playing bf3 on xbox 360 let me know. Just tell me your gamertag, not trying to brag but I get a lot of friend requests now a days. I don’t mind playing by myself because I honestly get better clips by myself, but I recorded a few games with some people where we were playing strategically and calling out stuff which will make for good live comm gameplays.

item.title: Bf3 Players review this
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:12, topic:517865”][quote author=Tutorial link=topic=636129.msg4293663#msg4293663 date=1367810556]

You’re lucky it wasn’t fly beside you, because on that sensitivity it would have taken you a year to turn.

My grammar was horrible in that statement! Yeah, I was just joking around with you.

Edit: Is this Xbox-360?

I’ve always wanted to play and record clips, since I have an HD PVR that has been gathering dust for a few months now. I just cannot stand to play any game by myself.

Yes it is

[/quote]
Messed up your quote? I’m the same way when playing any multiplayer compatible game; I hate playing by myself.[/quote]
Haha, I have no idea how I did that.

Read full topic
